author: My Nguyen, CIA
content: First of all, really much appreciate the great support from Long during the time I took the online CIA course program. His materials which (i) documents for learning i.e documents and summaries are very brief, useful and easy to remember and understand; (ii) mock exams are quite similar to the real exams with good explanation. Furthermore, he is willing to support the revision for better preparation prior to the exam taken.

author: Tram Luu Thi Thuy, ACCA, CIA
content:
His online course content, along with his sharing of his experience or normal/actual practice is very thorough and provides a better understanding of the internal audit work, especially useful for new internal auditors and those in need of deeper knowledge. Despite reading through the materials, itâ€™s always much better to listen to his video.
 
The tests after each lesson and mock exams are very useful as its structure is quite similar to actual CIA exam questions. He also helps answering questions and organizing the review before the exam to evaluate and guide through our thinking process and tips for justifications of answers.
Highly recommended for CIA candidates!

author: Bao Ngoc Tran, CIA
content:
Long was my tutor for more than four years since the date I planned to get this CIA certification. Long is the most patient tutor I've ever had (until now), who (I think) suffered from my learning style, my busy life, and my procrastination during his time tutoring me. 

His material is well-structured and is easy-use to start learning (even though you're unfamiliar with internal audit). I experienced his kindness, carefulness, and high responsibility. He also has tools to track your study progress, a dashboard to identify your weakness from testing results, and a daily reminder tool to break students' procrastination.

I want to say thank you so much for your patience with me during all these years. I finally get my cert and I may not get in on time without your support. Wish you luck and success in your tutoring career.
